borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint128).details: Users must have sufficient collateral to borrow. Cross-chain borrowing uses LayerZero.

liquidation(address).details: Anyone can call this function to liquidate unhealthy positions and receive liquidation bonus

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate

repayWithSelectedToken(address,address,u.details: Users must approve tokens before calling this function. If token differs from borrow token, it will be swapped.

params._amountOutMinimum: Minimum amount of borrow token expected from swap
params._fromPosition: Whether to repay from position balance or user wallet
params._shares: Number of borrow shares to repay
params._token: Address of the token used for repayment
params._user: Address of the user repaying the debt

supplyCollateral(address,uint256).details: Users must approve tokens before calling this function

params._user: Address of the user to supply collateral for

supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).details: Users must approve tokens before calling this function. Liquidity providers earn interest from borrowers.

params._user: Address of the user to supply liquidity for

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.details: Allows users to rebalance their collateral by swapping tokens within their position

params.amountIn: Amount of input tokens to swap
params.slippageTolerance: Slippage tolerance for the swap (in basis points)

withdrawCollateral(uint256).details: Users must have sufficient collateral and maintain healthy positions after withdrawal

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).details: Users must have sufficient shares to withdraw

params._shares: Number of shares to redeem for underlying tokens

borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint128).notice: Borrows debt from the lending pool

router().notice: Returns the address of the lending pool router

supplyCollateral(address,uint256).notice: Supplies collateral to the lending pool

supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: Supplies liquidity to the lending pool

withdrawCollateral(uint256).notice: Withdraws supplied collateral from the user's position

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).notice: Withdraws supplied liquidity by redeeming shares
